categories.title: Food Grade Salts
categories.description: Edible Salt meets all prescribed IDD (Iodine Deficiency Disorder) standards and is exported to markets worldwide. It is fine, free-flowing, tasty, healthy, and perfectly suited for everyday cooking needs. Fortified with iodine above natural levels, it not only enhances flavor but also supports overall health.

applications.use: Bakery products, dairy processing, and beverage production.
Used in nutritional and fortified food products.

categories.note: Refined Iodized Salt plays a vital role in both flavor enhancement and nutrition enrichment, making it an indispensable ingredient for kitchens and food industries around the world.

categories.title: Industrial Salt
categories.description: Industrial Salt is a vital raw material with a wide range of applications across multiple sectors. Known for its purity and freshness, our salt is trusted in both domestic and international markets.

applications.use: Widely used in textile, hosiery, and dyeing industries.
In demand in pharmaceuticals, paints and distempers, dyes and chemicals, intermediate UV fluid industries, drilling applications, and more.
Serves the needs of dye, chemical, seafood, and frozen food companies.
Popular in soap manufacturing, chemical industries and ayurvedic preparations.
Essential for producing detergents and washing powders.
Required in explosive manufacturing, specialty chemical production, granite polishing, and drilling operations

categories.note: With its variety of grades and applications, industrial salt remains an indispensable material for countless manufacturing processes worldwide.

categories.title: Crystal Raw Salt
categories.description: Natural Crystal (Raw) Salt is the most basic and essential condiment, obtained through the simple evaporation of seawater without artificial techniques. It is rich in a wide range of naturally occurring minerals that no synthetic supplement can truly match, regardless of how precisely formulated.

applications.use: Used on fishing vessels for fish preservation, maintaining fish health during transport, and protecting against corrosion caused by seawater
Helps reduce hardness in water, making it suitable for domestic and industrial use
Serves as a raw material in various manufacturing processes.
Used in curing hides and skins to prevent decay before processing.
High-performance De-icing Salt for quick melting of snow and ice. Keeps roads, pathways, and driveways safe, reducing slips and accidents during winter

categories.note: Its versatility and natural mineral content make crystal salt an invaluable resource for both traditional and industrial purposes.

categories.title: Water Softening Salt (Pool)
categories.description: High-purity Water Softening Salt that removes hardness-causing minerals. Protects appliances, prevents scale buildup, and delivers pure, soft water for home and industry

products.title: Garnet Sand 80 Mesh
products.shortDescription: High-performance garnet abrasive for waterjet cutting.
products.description: Durable and sharp garnet sand, widely used for waterjet cutting, sandblasting, and surface preparation across industries.

products.title: Talc Powder
products.shortDescription: Soft mineral powder used in cosmetics and industry.
products.description: Talc powder is valued for its smoothness, chemical inertness, and softness, making it ideal for cosmetics, paints, plastics, and ceramics.

products.title: Quartz Lumps
products.shortDescription: High-purity quartz for glass and ceramics.
products.description: Quartz is one of the most abundant minerals, used in glassmaking, ceramics, foundry molds, and electronics due to its high silica content.

products.title: Bentonite Powder
products.shortDescription: Absorbent clay used in drilling, binding, and purification.
products.description: Bentonite is a naturally occurring clay with high swelling and absorption capacity, widely used in drilling mud, foundry sand, iron ore pelletization, and water purification.

products.title: Dolomite Powder
products.description: Dolomite powder is used in steelmaking, glass, ceramics, and agriculture as a source of calcium and magnesium. It improves soil quality and neutralizes acidity.

products.title: Potash Feldspar
products.shortDescription: Essential mineral for ceramics and glass.
products.description: Potash feldspar is widely used in ceramics, glass, and enamel industries due to its fluxing properties, which enhance strength and durability.

products.title: Calcined Kaolin Powder
products.shortDescription: Refined clay mineral for industrial applications.
products.description: Calcined kaolin is produced by heating natural kaolin, enhancing brightness and chemical resistance. It is used in paper, paints, plastics, and rubber industries.
